name: Dungeon Tower
description:
You are an apprentice wizard who must reach the top of the Dungeon Tower and obtain the powerful power of the elements. The tower will allow you to use only what you find in it. Welcome to Dungeon Tower!!

This game is a Beta, but i will finish this! :)

(if this have a bugs, don't worry, i'm fixed this, please comment if have a bug)

Enjoy!!
